Decree_BuildMonument.questDescriptionRul.li:
questDescription->[decreeIntro]

You must build a monument. It is [monumentSize] in size and will require these resources (total value [monumentRequiredResourcesMarketValue_money]):

[monumentRequiredResources]

[decreeThreatInfo]

You must keep the monument safe for [keepMonumentTicks_duration] after completion, otherwise [asker_nameDef] will be unhappy.

LanguageData.Decree_BuildMonument.LetterTextNewMonume: Since the monument marker has been destroyed, a new one has been sent.
LanguageData.Decree_BuildMonument.LetterTextMonumentC: You have completed construction of the monument.\n\nYou must keep it safe for [keepMonumentTicks_duration], otherwise [asker_nameDef] will be displeased.
LanguageData.Decree_BuildMonument.LetterTextMonumentD: [asker_nameDef] is offended that you allowed the monument to be ruined so soon after completion.\n\n[asker_pronoun] will be unhappy about this.
LanguageData.Decree_BuildMonument.DontDestroyMonument: Do not destroy the monument for {0}
Do not destroy the monument for {0}

Decree_HarvestCrop.questDescriptionRules.li:
questDescription->[decreeIntro]

You must harvest [plantToHarvest_label] x[harvestItemCount].

You may need to plant and grow the [plantToHarvest_label] first.

[decreeThreatInfo]
